title: Haddock souffl√©
ingredients: ['25g butter', '1 small shallot, minced', '25g plain flour', '300ml full fat milk', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1/2 teaspoon English mustard powder', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chervil', '3 egg yolks', '4 egg whites', '225g cooked haddock, flaked']
